data.introduce: 本接口实现了调整国际电子客票退票票面状态的功能。
data.business:
1.支持将客票状态由OPEN FOR USE改为REFUNDED：
支持手工退票场景；
仅限当天国际客票退票状态调整使用，且在退票之后操作，退票时只有电子客票客票状态是OPEN FOR USE才可以使用。
2.支持将客票状态由REFUNDED改为OPEN FOR USE:
支持自动退票和手工退票场景;
支持国内票、国际票；
针对国内票两个航段分两次退票的场景，不支持将票面状态从REFUNDED改为OPEN FOR USE；
CZ、BR/B7暂不支持R2O功能（报错：AIRLINE NOT ALLOWED REFUND CANCEL）；
仅限退票当天客票状态调整使用，第一步先调用E52-删除退票单接口删除退票单；第二步调用本接口将票面状态从refunded改为open for use。
3、支持票证类型：暂时支持BSP、BOP、本票AL。
data.functions:
本接口支持如下指令功能：
将客票状态由OPEN FOR USE改为REFUNDED
也可以将客票状态由REFUNDED改为OPEN FOR USE

调用接口时请求中的属性CancelRefundInd默认为false，默认为将客票状态从OPEN FOR USE修改为REFUNDED，当指定CancelRefundInd为true时，修改票面状态从REFUNDED为OPEN FOR USE。

ETRF:航段序号/票号/PRNT/打票机号

国内航司国际票按航段修改票面状态，如原票包含多个航段需调用多次本接口进行修改；外航客票修改一段即完成所有航段票面状态修改，调用一次即可。建议代理人用户使用本接口后务必检查票面状态，以免发生遗漏。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirTicketEtrfRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"修改票面状态请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketRefundDetailInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PrintDeviceNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"SegmentId","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段序号。
如为外航客票：传原票任意一个航段序号即可完成所有航段票面状态修改","children":[]}]},{"name":"@CancelRefundInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"R2O 方法转换标志。
判断是否调用CancelRefundETkt","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证类型。
如：BSP,BOP,AL","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketEtrfRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"修改票面状态响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"ETRFResult","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"修改票面状态返回结果","children":[]}]}]
